function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to monitor public health and government announcements can result in non-compliance with regulations and guidelines, leading to increased risk of contagious disease propagation.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread, potential fines or penalties for non-compliance.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of public health and government announcements, strict enforcement of regulations, and adherence to guidelines.","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, compliance tracking software, communication tools for sharing updates.","People":"Construction workers, staff, and public.","Owner":"Construction organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of enforcement of policies mandating employees to refrain from work when symptomatic or exposed to COVID-19 can result in workplace transmission of the virus.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission within the workplace, potential outbreak among workers.","Mitigation":"Strict enforcement of policies, provision of remote work options, and support for affected workers.","Technologies":"Remote work tools, health monitoring systems, contact tracing technology.","People":"Construction workers, staff, and public.","Owner":"Construction organizations."},{"Description":"Inadequate support for workers in the event of a positive COVID-19 case can result in fear, stigma, and reluctance to report symptoms, leading to underreporting of cases and increased risk of transmission.","Impact":"Underreporting of cases, fear and stigma among workers, potential spread of the virus.","Mitigation":"Provision of support, guidance, and counseling for affected workers, clear communication to reduce stigma, and promotion of reporting symptoms.","Technologies":"Communication tools, mental health support platforms, anonymous reporting systems.","People":"Construction workers, staff, and public.","Owner":"Construction organizations."}]}
